Job Title: Senior Strategic Sourcing Spec

Location: Tempe, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Purchasing, Supply Chain

Description:
Deliver business value through Right and Fast partnership

About Honeywell

Honeywell International Inc. (NYSE: HON) invents and commercializes technologies that address some of the world’s most critical challenges around energy, safety, security, air travel, productivity, and global urbanization. We are a leading software-industrial company committed to introducing state of the art technology solutions to improve efficiency, productivity, sustainability, and safety in high growth businesses in broad-based, attractive industrial end markets. Our products and solutions enable a safer, more comfortable, and more productive world, enhancing the quality of life of people around the globe.

As a Senior Strategic Sourcing Specialist here at Honeywell, you will play a critical role in developing and executing sourcing strategies for the ISC Government Compliance Procurement Integrity Team. In this role will support Government Procurement Teams to ensure compliance requirements are met in Commercial, FAR 12 and FAR 15 contracting actions.

The salary range for this position is $75,400-$94,200. The actual base salary offer will depend on a variety of factors including experience , education, geography, and other relevant factors.

Key Responsibilities

Providing guidance and direction to procurement professionals in support of procurement actions by referencing the FAR, DFARS and company policies and proceduresAuditing purchase order file documentation in SAP in accordance with (IAW) the FAR 15 Government Purchasing Manual (GPM)Providing guidance and direction to procurement professionals in support of procurement actions by referencing the FAR, DFARS and company policies and proceduresAssisting with developing and implementing policies and procedures to ensure compliance with the appropriate statutes and regulationsInterface with Procurement management and staff to assist in ensuring compliance to company policy and CPSR (Certified Purchasing System Review) requirementsCollaborate to identify and standardize discrepancies in the auditing process to ensure uniformity 

YOU MUST HAVE

2+ years of experience in Procurement, Supply Chain, Accounting, Financial Analysis and/or Pricing Analysis2+ years’ experience with Microsoft Office softwareAbility to read, write and speak English

WE VALUE

Experience interpreting FAR and DFARS, local and state law and regulations, and applicable international requirementsExperience with SAP or site relevant ERP systems, AeroCMS and the Enhanced Procurement and Compliance ToolGovernment contracting experienceWorking in Team EnvironmentsExperience training individuals and teamsProject Management and/or Contract Management ExperienceDemonstrated Business and financial acumenExperience interpreting and following supply chain policies and procedures and revising them as neededExperience interfacing with Defense Contract Management Agency (DCMA), Defense Contract Audit Agency (DCAA), and internal auditors

U.s. Person Requirements

Due to compliance with U.S. export control laws and regulations, candidate must be a U.S. Person, which is defined as, a U.S. citizen, a U.S. permanent resident, or have protected status in the U.S. under asylum or refugee status.

Additional Information

JOB ID: HRD228687Category: ProcurementLocation: 1300 W Warner Rd.,Tempe,Arizona,85284,United StatesExemptDue to US export control laws, must be a US citizen, permanent resident or have protected status.

Sales (GLOBAL)

Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
